components.name: Frontend
components.description: React SPA that provides user interfaces for creating, configuring, and monitoring AI agents.

components.name: Backend API
components.description: FastAPI service that handles authentication, business logic, data persistence, and orchestration of AI requests.

components.name: Database
components.description: PostgreSQL instance storing agent definitions, user data, logs, and task queues.

components.name: AI Service
components.description: External provider (e.g., OpenAI) that executes the agent prompts and returns results.

data_flows.description: User submits agent configuration or prompt via HTTPS.
Persist agent definitions, user sessions, and logs.
Send prompt and receive generated response.
Return agent status, logs, or AI responses to the user.

trust_boundaries.name: Client-Server Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Separates the untrusted browser environment from the trusted backend.

trust_boundaries.name: Server-Database Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Separates application logic from persistent storage.

trust_boundaries.name: Server-External Service Boundary
trust_boundaries.description: Separates internal processing from third‑party AI providers.
